main event: A reddish, hazy object was observed by radar and visually for 45 minutes over Atlanta, Georgia in November 1957.
interesting points: The object was the size of a basketball and moved slowly.
There were three objects observed, but they were described as a single reddish, hazy object.
The object was seen blinking on and off during the sighting.
After the object passed out of sight, two stars seemed to appear and then disappear.
The sighting was reported by a civilian medical student.
